org.kepler.reporting.rio.fop

Class ReportRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.reporting.rio.fop.ReportRenderer

  • public class ReportRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class converts a report object to XML, PDF, and AWT using JAXP (XSLT) and FOP (XSL:FO).

        public static void convertReport2PDF(ReportInstance report,
                                     java.io.File pdf,
                                     java.io.InputStream xsltStream)
                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                     org.apache.fop.apps.FOPException,
                                     javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Converts a Report object to a PDF file.
        Parameters:
        report - the Report object
        pdf - the target PDF file
        xsltStream - the stylesheet input stream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case of an I/O problem
        org.apache.fop.apps.FOPException - In case of a FOP problem
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - In case of a XSL transformation problem

      • renderReportAsAWT

        public void renderReportAsAWT(ReportInstance report,
                              java.io.File xslt)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              org.apache.fop.apps.FOPException,
                              javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Deprecated. 
        Renders the Report object in the default FOP viewer. Not intended to be embedded.
        Parameters:
        report - Report to render
        xslt - the transform to use for rendering the Report
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.apache.fop.apps.FOPException
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        See Also:
        for an embedded soltion.

      • convertReport2AWT

                                                   java.io.InputStream xslt)
                                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                                   org.apache.fop.apps.FOPException,
                                                   javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Used for embedding a viewer pane in swing applications
        Parameters:
        report - Report to render
        xslt - transform to use for rendering Report
        Returns:
        PreviewPane component that can be added to any GUI
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.apache.fop.apps.FOPException
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
